titles.title: To direct the Postmaster General to issue a forever stamp honoring the 1969 New York Mets on the 50th Anniversary of their World Series victory.
1969 New York Mets Stamp Act
1969 New York Mets Stamp Act
1969 New York Mets Stamp Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
1969 New York Mets Stamp Act
This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service to issue a forever stamp that depicts the 1969 New York Mets to honor the Mets on the 50th anniversary of their World Series victory.
